dashboard.title: OpsPilot Dashboard
dashboard.taskInstructionsDescription: Enter high-level business instructions for OpsPilot to process
dashboard.taskPlaceholder: E.g., Summarize last week's customer feedback and monitor social sentiment
dashboard.agentDecompose: OpsPilot will decompose your task and distribute it to the appropriate agents
dashboard.timelineDescription: Step-by-step flow of task decomposition and agent activities
dashboard.taskAnalyzed: Task analyzed and decomposed into subtasks
dashboard.agentIdle: Agent is idle. Submit a task to begin.
dashboard.agentCompleted: Task completed. Ready for new instructions.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: Manage and analyze customer data and feedback
customers.customerListDescription: Manage your customers and their feedback

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Track social media mentions and brand sentiment
monitoring.overviewDescription: Track social mentions and sentiment over time
monitoring.recentMentionsDescription: Latest mentions of your brand across social platforms
monitoring.sentimentSpikeDesc: Detected 25% increase in negative sentiment in the last hour
monitoring.highProfileMentionDesc: Your product was mentioned by an influencer with 500K+ followers
monitoring.recurringIssueDesc: Multiple reports of login problems in the last 24 hours
monitoring.sentimentChangeDesc: Overall sentiment trending positive after latest feature release
monitoring.competitorComparisonDesc: Your product is being compared to a competitor in industry forums

reports.title: Reports
reports.generatedReportsDescription: View and download your generated reports
reports.generateNewDescription: Create custom reports based on your data

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.performanceDescription: Visualize system performance and task distribution

taskHistory.title: Task History
taskHistory.description: View and analyze past tasks processed by OpsPilot

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and system preferences
settings.agentConfigDescription: Configure the behavior and capabilities of your AI agents
settings.temperatureDescription: Controls randomness: lower values are more deterministic, higher values more creative
settings.userProfileDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.notificationDescription: Configure how and when you receive notifications
settings.taskCompletionDesc: Receive notifications when tasks are completed
settings.agentStatusDesc: Receive notifications when agent status changes
settings.highPriorityDesc: Receive notifications for high priority alerts
settings.reportGenerationDesc: Receive notifications when reports are generated
settings.emailTaskCompletionDesc: Receive email notifications when tasks are completed
settings.emailHighPriorityDesc: Only receive email notifications for high priority alerts
settings.dailySummaryDesc: Receive a daily summary of all activities
settings.slackHighPriorityDesc: Only send high priority notifications to Slack
settings.apiKeysDescription: Manage your API keys for accessing the OpsPilot API
settings.webhooksDescription: Configure webhooks to receive real-time updates

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account

agents.monitorAgentDesc: Monitors social media and web mentions
agents.customerAgentPrompt: You are CustomerAgent, an AI assistant specialized in analyzing customer feedback and sentiment. Your goal is to extract valuable insights from customer data and provide actionable recommendations.
agents.monitorAgentPrompt: You are MonitorAgent, an AI assistant specialized in monitoring social media and web mentions. Your goal is to track brand mentions, analyze sentiment, and identify trending topics related to the product.
agents.reportAgentPrompt: You are ReportAgent, an AI assistant specialized in generating reports and summaries. Your goal is to compile data from other agents, generate insights, and create comprehensive reports with recommendations.
